github_resources.note: Secrets must be managed manually due to pulumi/pulumi-github#250

workaround_info.instructions: Run the commands in 'manual_secret_commands' to set GitHub secrets
workaround_info.workaround: Variables via Pulumi with delete_before_replace, secrets via manual gh CLI

inputs.create:
echo "Querying gpu compute environment..." >&2
            result=$(tw --access-token="eyJ0aWQiOiAxMjE5N30uZjlhMTMxYTQyMzA5ZDY2NTNkZGVkYWI5MDUxOTljMWE0MGVhMjhlNQ==" compute-envs list --workspace=nf-core/AWSmegatests 2>&1)
            if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
                echo "Error querying Tower CLI: $result" >&2
                echo "tower-query-failed-gpu"
                exit 1
            fi
            
            env_id=$(echo "$result" | grep "aws_ireland_fusionv2_nvme_gpu_snapshots" | awk '{print $1}' | head -1)
            if [ -z "$env_id" ]; then
                echo "No compute environment found matching pattern: aws_ireland_fusionv2_nvme_gpu_snapshots" >&2
                echo "Available compute environments:" >&2
                echo "$result" >&2
                echo "no-match-gpu-aws_ireland_fusionv2_nvme_gpu_snapshots"
                exit 1
            fi
            
            echo "$env_id"
